show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
For todayâ€™s show we will be looking at Human Rights in Palestine-Israel. <!--more--> We will interview four participants in the Sabeel Conference happening this weekend in Sacramento, indluding Huwaida Arraf co-founder of the International Socidarity movement, Laila El-Haddad author of Gaza Mom, Rev.
Don Wagner with Friends of Sabeel, and Anna Balzter with US Campaign to End the Israeli Occupation At the bottom of the hour we hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio and the labor calendar.
